markdownRemark.html: I recently started working at Anyfin. And as a new engineer on the team, I had to setup the entire development environment. In my head I had thought this would probably take me a few days to have a working setup (as I have experienced in my previous work engagements). To my surprise it took me about half a day to setup quite a few of backend services written in NodeJS, Golang and Python along side the web site and portal (Javascript). I found the setup at Anyfin extremely awesome and hence wanted to share it with everyone. This post will detail on how to effectively use Docker for setting up your local development environment. The entire credit goes to my colleagues: Kim, Niemi, Asparuh, Pepijn and Sven. I am just documenting it üò¨.
